content: --अयण (अयन) {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} attached or devoted to, adhering to. {2} depending on, subject to. {3} intent on, solely devoted to or absorbed in (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); प्रभुर्धनपरायणः <ls>Bh. 2. 56</ls>; so मोह° <ls>Ku. 4. 1</ls>; अग्निहोत्र° &c. {4} connected with {5} leading or conducive to. (--णं {1} the principal or highest object, chief aim, best or last resort. {2} essence, sum. {3} <ab>Ved.</ab> going away, departure, exit. {4} firm devotion.
